moves.1. e4: Hai everyone. This is my past game in 83rd GK tournament. I am annotating this game since it has some interesting moves and its kinda quick game.
moves.2... Nc6 3. c3: Playing in a defense is always my favorite.
moves.3... Nf6 4. d3 d6 5. d4 Nxe4: My opponent is very aggressive its seems.. Its OK.
moves.6. dxe5: I wanna open d rank to execute my attack.
moves.6... g6 7. Qd5: My QUEEN came out for an attack..
moves.7... Bf5: My opp. also prepares his pieces for an attack..
moves.8... Nxf2: Not taking my pawn and aiming for my ROOK..
moves.9... Nxh1 10. Bg5: Positioning my pieces for an aggressive attack. Only some few moves makes a MASTER BLASTER checkmate.
moves.11... Bf8 12. Bb5: White has good fighting position... Aiming the enemy KING.
moves.12... Qd7: Here you can see how critical situation the Black king is...
moves.13. Nd4: Bringing my Knight in the right spot.
moves.13... dxe5: Taking my pawn.. Not a good idea in this moment..
moves.14... bxc6 15. Qxe5+ Kd8 16. Qe4: POSITIONING my QUEEN in the center, the right spot aiming a fabulous CHECKMATE...
moves.17... Kc8: The only move without sacrificing his Queen..
moves.18. Ne7+: Here, black has no option, but only to resign... if Kb8 Qb4+ followed by checkmate by taking his Queen or if Kd8 or Bxe7 Qa8+ followed by checkmate by taking his Queen. An interesting game having some unexpected moves.

gameName: 83rd GK tournament - Game again with mobtrio
